title: Ticket #5893: Add parameter for additional JSON to GCE insert request
description:
Add gce_json_file for additional JSON

- partial feature implementation

- additional json to be appended onto the GCE insert request

- can be specified in the condor submit via gce_json_file

Did not yet add documentation as this is still a partial feature. To fully implement this feature, a merge of the JSON should be done. As written, the feature can only support attributes that are not included in the standard GCE GAHP insert request.
remarks:
2016-Sep-14 13:09:52 by jfrey:
Code Review

These changes look good. I'll commit them with a couple minor tweaks.
